name: Timmy's Toy's (The Revenge)
description:
Survival Shooter - Timmy's Toys

Kill all Bunnies & Bears! Also the odd Helephant of bouncing death. Toys make strange sounds at night!

(Be sure to enlarge the screen for the little dude to move around)

Controls: Keyboard Directional A/W/D/S & Mouse Aim/Fire
